name: Small Beings
description:
Small Beings

Alien explorers drifting through outer space have crash-landed on an unknown planet after their flight was disrupted by a strange force. They'll have to work together to get to the bottom of this and get back to their travels - assuming they don't get separated, of course...

Play as Captain Ren and explore the dark forest his ship crashed in, to find both crewmates and the source of what's going on. Roll call is missing Jay, Skater Boi, Gili, and Beki - all of whom have special abilities that will assist exploration greatly.

Captain's Manual
WASD = Move around
Space Bar = Jump
Left Mouse Button = Raygun

Your crew is a single unit that works best together. Hold Shift to prepare their abilities!
Shift + Space Bar = Super Jump ~Jay (Green)
Shift + Right Mouse Button = Danger Skates ~Skater Boi (Blue)
Shift + Middle Mouse Button = Power Glider ~Gili (Pink)
Shift + Left Mouse Button = Mega Hammer ~Beki (Purple)

You're a team! Experiment and use your powers in tandem to overcome challenges!

-Game developed in a week for Brakey's GameJam-
